Description: Pre-engineered metal building shell (60x100 ft clear-span; unheated) — includes framing; roof; wall cladding; gutters/downspouts; anchor bolts; erection. Does NOT include foundation; floor; doors; electrical; ventilation.
SourceRef: Parametric_Building_Rates.csv PB-01 RecommendedRate=$32/sf x 6000 sf (PP-07); DEC-001 confirms 60x100=6000 sf
Notes: PB-01 shell-only parametric rate ($28-35/sf range; $32 recommended). Cost ownership: shell only per brief. Qty=1 LS per parametric convention.

Description: Design and engineering services — cold storage building design basis and configuration (architectural/structural design for shell)
SourceRef: Assumptions_Log.md ASM-003; no explicit design fee source in PRICE_SOURCES
Notes: Allowance for DB design/engineering effort attributable to cold storage shell configuration. FALLBACK_POLICY=ALLOW_ALLOWANCE. Estimated as ~5% of shell construction cost. Qty=1 LS per allowance convention.
